version_description: Bug fixes

We’ve added more accounts to view in our app.
In this release you can now view more of your accounts under “My Accounts” although you won’t be able to complete any transactions on them just yet, this is coming soon.
The accounts you can now view are:
Mortgages
Secured Personal Loan
Unsecured Personal Loan
Investments
A range of our Insurance products

Based on your feedback we have made some improvements, so in this latest release you can now:
•use Mobile Banking straightaway, without having to log on to Online Banking first
•see account details for investments and personal loans
•see policy information for insurance products
•see transaction history for investments.

If you’re new to the Santander Mobile Banking app our tutorial will make sure you can benefit from Mobile Banking straight away.
If you don’t already have log on details we’ve also made it easier to get up and running when you’ve downloaded the app.
To sign up you’ll need;
•your most recent debit or credit card or
•your banking or saving account details
And we’ve listened to your feedback and built a version for the latest iPhone’s. (iPhone 6 and above)

If you’re new to our Mobile Banking app, this tutorial will show you how to benefit from using Mobile Banking quickly and simply.

We’ve also made it easier for you to reset your log on details should you forget them, you’ll need to have:

* already used Online or Mobile Banking; and
* your most recent debit/credit card or your banking/saving account details to hand.

Using the Santander Mobile Banking app you can now:
•set up and pay new payees
•set up, view, amend and cancel standing orders
•view and cancel your Direct Debits
•see your transaction information much more clearly

There are no updates to the Santander iPad app.

We’ve made a few changes, including several behind-the-scenes performance enhancements, to make sure your banking experience is seamless.

Some of the new payee functionality has been removed to make sure that it’s working correctly for all of our customers.

We’re also busy working on some great other new features that we hope to bring you soon.

We’ve now managed to make some background improvements, so we want to share the new functions with you straight away.

Using the Santander Mobile Banking app you can now:

. set up and pay new payees;
. set up, view, amend and cancel standing orders;
. view and cancel your Direct Debits; and
. see your transaction information much more clearly.

We’ve also made background improvements to the Santander iPad app, but the above new functions are only available on iPhone.

Using the Santander Mobile Banking app you can now:
• View the interest rate on your savings accounts, ISAs and Bonds

We’ve been busy making changes, including some bug fixes to make sure you have the best experience using our app.

Thanks for all the feedback, we’re working hard on improvements, so keep a look out for some exciting changes heading your way soon.

Happy banking
Santander

In this release we have fixed some bugs to make sure you have the best experience using our app.
Thanks for all the feedback, we’re working hard on improvements, so keep a look out for some exciting changes heading your way soon.

Happy Banking
Santander

With this release we ensure that Personal Banking is compatible with iOS 11.
We’ve got some exciting changes coming your way soon, so watch this space.

Welcome to Santander’s new and improved Mobile Banking app. Now it’s easier than ever to manage your money on the move with clearer navigation, updated features and enhanced security to keep you and your finances safe.

Welcome to Santander’s new and improved Mobile Banking app. Now it’s easier than ever to manage your money on the move with clearer navigation, updated features and enhanced security to keep you and your finances safe.

Thanks for your feedback, we’re working hard to make the app even better. In this release we’ve fixed bugs that have caused issues with payments and standing orders, along with a few other tweaks to improve your experience. Please leave a review to let us know what works well and what improvements you would like to see.

Thanks for your feedback, we’re working hard to make the app even better. In this release we’ve fixed bugs that have caused issues with payments and standing orders, along with a few other tweaks to improve your experience. Please leave a review to let us know what works well and what improvements you would like to see.

We’re listening to your feedback and have been working hard to improve the app. We’ve fixed a number of bugs which occasionally prevented some customers from logging on or making payments. We’ve also improved Voice Over and made it easier for you to update your marketing preferences.

If you’re enjoying using the app please leave us a review.

•You can now set up a Quick Balance widget on your device, which will let you see your balance without having to log on to the app. Visit ‘Settings’ in the ‘More’ menu to get started.
•We’ve redesigned the forms you use to make payments, to help keep you and your money even safer.
•Where the option is provided by retailers, you will now be able to use the app to authorise online purchases you’ve made using your Santander credit or debit card.
Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking!

We appreciate all your feedback about the app and hope you’re enjoying the new features we’ve introduced. With this update you’ll now be able to share payment confirmation details with your contacts through email, SMS or messaging apps. You’ll also be asked to allow push notifications from Santander, so that we can enhance your app security experience and send you important information about your accounts, direct to your device.

We’re listening to your feedback and have been working hard to improve the app. We’ve fixed a number of bugs which occasionally prevented some customers from logging on or making payments. We’ve also improved Voice Over and made it easier for you to update your marketing preferences.

If you’re enjoying using the app please leave us a review.

If you have an unsecured personal loan with Santander you’ll now be able to see more detail about this in the app. You can also make a payment directly from the menu in any eligible account and, if you’ve got a Credit Card with us, you’ll see an option to manage your credit limit and how we communicate with you about it. Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking, please leave us a review – we’re listening to all your feedback.

If you have an unsecured personal loan with Santander you’ll now be able to see more detail about this in the app. You can also make a payment directly from the menu in any eligible account and, if you’ve got a Credit Card with us, you’ll see an option to manage your credit limit and how we communicate with you about it. Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking, please leave us a review – we’re listening to all your feedback.

Credit Card customer? Thanks to your feedback, you’ll see a new section for ‘pending transactions’, where payments you’ve made will now show before they’ve cleared. Made an investment with Santander? You’ll now see more information in your app. And for customers with Current and Savings Accounts, we’ve made it easier to transfer funds directly from the account menu. Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking. Please leave us a review – we’re listening to all your feedback.

Credit Card customer? Thanks to your feedback, you’ll see a new section for ‘pending transactions’, where payments you’ve made will now show before they’ve cleared. Made an investment with Santander? You’ll now see more information in your app. And for customers with Current and Savings Accounts, we’ve made it easier to transfer funds directly from the account menu. Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking. Please leave us a review – we’re listening to all your feedback.

We appreciate all your feedback about the app and hope you’re enjoying the new features we’ve introduced. With this update you’ll now be able to share payment confirmation details with your contacts through email, SMS or messaging apps. You’ll also be asked to allow push notifications from Santander, so that we can enhance your app security experience and send you important information about your accounts, direct to your device.

•You can now set up a Quick Balance widget on your device, which will let you see your balance without having to log on to the app. Visit ‘Settings’ in the ‘More’ menu to get started.
•We’ve redesigned the forms you use to make payments, to help keep you and your money even safer.
•Where the option is provided by retailers, you will now be able to use the app to authorise online purchases you’ve made using your Santander credit or debit card.
Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking!
You can now apply for a loan or Regular eSaver in just a few clicks using our new pre-filled forms. Visit ‘Apply’ in the ‘More’ menu to get started. Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking!

It’s here!.

You’ll now be able to authorise consents with third party providers through the app.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

You’ll now be able to authenticate transactions with Touch ID, Face ID or your Security Number.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

You’ll now be able to authenticate transactions with Touch ID, Face ID or your Security Number.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

It’s here! You can now see pending transactions on your current account, making it easier to track your spending. Learn more in our in-app FAQs.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

The way we show your balance has changed so that it’s clearer to see when you’re in an overdraft. And a new figure ‘balance incl pending’ will show your balance including any transactions due to come out of your account.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

The way we show your balance has changed so that it’s clearer to see when you’re in an overdraft. And a new figure ‘balance incl pending’ will show your balance including any transactions due to come out of your account.

Freeze your Mastercard debit or credit card if you’ve lost it.

If you’ve forgotten your PIN, see it instantly in the handy new ‘View PIN’ feature.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

The way we show your balance has changed so that it’s clearer to see when you’re in an overdraft. And a new figure ‘balance incl pending’ will show your balance including any transactions due to come out of your account.

Freeze your Mastercard debit or credit card if you’ve lost it.

If you’ve forgotten your PIN, see it instantly in the handy new ‘View PIN’ feature.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

We’ve changed the way you pay someone new. As well as the account number and sort code, you’ll now need to enter the full account name exactly as it appears on their account and the account type – personal or business.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

You can now do much more with your mortgage in your mobile banking app.

If you have a Santander mortgage you can now use Mobile Banking to carry out a variety of transactions:
• See key information about your mortgage
• Make one-off overpayments
• Set up, edit and cancel regular overpayments
• If your mortgage deal is coming to an end, you can compare products, and change to a new deal online.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

We've changed the way you pay someone new. As well as the account number and sort code, you'll now need to enter the full account name exactly as it appears on their account and the account type - personal or business.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking

This version includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking

Money made easy. My Money Manager has landed. Our new tool helps you keep track of your spending.

My Money Manager: Trying to be better with your money and savings? We’ve created My Money Manager to give you free, helpful insights based on what you do in your Santander accounts. It can let you know where you’re at with bills, what and where you spend each month and tell you when funds come into your account. And the more you use your accounts, the more insights you’re likely to get. We’ll send messages straight to your phone when a new insight arrives. You can even rate these insights to tell us if you like them or not, and we’ll send you more of what you like.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.

Lost or stolen cards: It’s now easier than ever to report your card as lost or stolen using your Santander mobile banking app. We’ll immediately cancel your card and send a replacement to you in the post.

Pay credit card: You kept asking us and here it is. You can now easily pay your Santander credit card from the app with our new and greatly improved process.

Thanks for using Santander Mobile Banking.
This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
We're always working on new features, bug fixes and performance improvements. Please ensure you stay updated with the latest version for the best experience.
Let us know if your card gets damaged and we’ll send you a replacement, no need to set up a new PIN.
